name: strand-spinner
description: An animated spinning graphic which can be dispalyed during indeterminite loading states.

attributes.name: radius
attributes.description: The radius of the spinner (which is always circular). As expected, radius of 9 yeilds an 18px circle.

attributes.name: innerRadius
attributes.description: The inner radius of the spinner from where the line tick starts drawing. Values greater than 1 are pixel based - less than 1 is proportional to radius (ie. 0.5 == 50% of radius)

attributes.name: numTicks
attributes.description: The number of ticks (lines) which compose the circumference of the spinner. Defaults to 12 for a 'standard' analog clock look.

attributes.name: speed
attributes.description: Spinner speed in cycles per second.

attributes.name: lineWidth
attributes.description: The width of each tick (line) which compose the circumference of the spinner. Values greater than 1 are pixel based - less than 1 is proportional to radius (ie. 0.5 == 50% of radius)

attributes.name: lineWeight
attributes.description: The thickness of each tick (line) which compose the circumference of the spinner. Values greater than 1 are pixel based - less than 1 is proportional to the square root of radius (ie. 0.5 == sqrt(radius) * 0.5)

attributes.name: fillColor
attributes.description: The hex color number to fill each tick (line) which compose the circumference of the spinner. Expects a 7 character string (i.e. '#ffffff').

attributes.name: bgColor
attributes.description: The hex color number to fill the background of the spinner. The default is null to leave the background transparent.

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: Whether or not the animation is running.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Instructs the spinner to begin animating.

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Instructs the spinner to stop animating, and resets the spinners animation state to default.
